TEXT.TITLE: TEXAS INTERNATIONAL <TEI> RETIRES SOME NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Texas International Co said it has retired 2,700,000 dlrs of its 10 pct third delayed convertible snior subordinated notes of 1993 Series A and B. As a result, it said it has eliminated the scheduled May 1987 conversions of 1,300,000 dlrs of Series A notes and 1,400,000 dlrs of Series B notes. Reuter
